welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Matthews, where southern hospitality meets charming small-town vibes. Get ready to discover our rich history, delicious cuisine, and vibrant community. We hope you have a wonderful stay and make unforgettable memories here!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Charlotte Douglas Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A primarily serves American Airlines flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B serves various airlines including Delta, United, and Southwest.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C serves various airlines including JetBlue, Spirit, and Frontier.

terminals.name: Concourse D
terminals.description: Concourse D serves various airlines including Alaska, Allegiant, and Air Canada.

terminals.name: Concourse E
terminals.description: Concourse E serves various international airlines and includes a USO lounge for military personnel.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
